1.name: The Graduate
1.description: A disillusioned college graduate finds himself torn between his older lover and her daughter.

2.name: The Dirty Dozen
2.description: During World War II, a rebellious U.S. Army Major is assigned a dozen convicted murderers to train and lead them into a mass assassination mission of German officers.

3.name: Bonnie and Clyde
3.description: Bored waitress Bonnie Parker falls in love with an ex-con named Clyde Barrow and together they start a violent crime spree through the country, stealing cars and robbing banks.

4.name: El Dorado
4.description: Cole Thornton, a gunfighter for hire, joins forces with an old friend, Sheriff J.P. Hara. Together with an old Indian fighter and a gambler, they help a rancher and his family fight a rival rancher that is trying to steal their water.

5.name: The Jungle Book
5.description: Bagheera the Panther and Baloo the Bear have a difficult time trying to convince a boy to leave the jungle for human civilization.

6.name: Cool Hand Luke
6.description: A laid back Southern man is sentenced to two years in a rural prison, but refuses to conform.

7.name: In the Heat of the Night
7.description: An African-American police detective is asked to investigate a murder in a racially hostile southern town.

8.name: Casino Royale
8.description: In an early spy spoof, aging Sir James Bond comes out of retirement to take on SMERSH.

9.name: Dance of the Vampires
9.description: A noted professor and his dim-witted apprentice fall prey to their inquiring vampires, while on the trail of the ominous damsel in distress.

10.name: You Only Live Twice
10.description: Agent 007 and the Japanese Secret Service ninja force must find and stop the true culprit of a series of spacejackings before nuclear war is provoked.

11.name: Hombre
11.description: John Russell, disdained by his "respectable" fellow stagecoach passengers because he was raised by Native Americans, becomes their only hope for survival when they are set upon by outlaws.

12.name: Belle de jour
12.description: A frigid young housewife decides to spend her midweek afternoons as a prostitute.

13.name: Valley of the Dolls
13.description: Film version of Jacqueline Susann's best-selling novel chronicling the rise and fall of three young women in show business.

14.name: I Call First
14.description: A young man struggles with the fact that his girlfriend was once raped.

15.name: Spider Baby or, the Maddest Story Ever Told
15.description: A caretaker devotes himself to three demented siblings after their father's death.

16.name: Le samouraï
16.description: After professional hitman Jef Costello is seen by witnesses his efforts to provide himself an alibi drive him further into a corner.

17.name: The Producers
17.description: Producers Max Bialystock and Leo Bloom make money by producing a sure-fire flop.

18.name: Guess Who's Coming to Dinner
18.description: A couple's attitudes are challenged when their daughter introduces them to her African-American fiancé.

19.name: Doctor Dolittle
19.description: After the animal communicating veterinarian goes too far for his clientele, he and his friends escape their hometown to the sea in search of the Great Pink Sea Snail.

20.name: Wait Until Dark
20.description: A recently blinded woman is terrorized by a trio of thugs while they search for a heroin-stuffed doll they believe is in her apartment.

21.name: Jag är nyfiken - en film i gult
21.description: Lena, aged twenty, wants to know all she can about life and reality. She collects information on everyone and everything, storing her findings in an enormous archive. She experiments with ...                See full summary »

22.name: Clambake
22.description: The heir to an oil fortune trades places with a water-ski instructor at a Florida hotel to see if girls will like him for himself, rather than his father's money.

23.name: In Cold Blood
23.description: After a botched robbery results in the brutal murder of a rural family, two drifters elude police, in the end coming to terms with their own mortality and the repercussions of their vile atrocity.

24.name: A Countess from Hong Kong
24.description: In Hong Kong, the ambassador returning to America meets the Russian countess, a refugee without a passport, who decides to hide in his cabin.

25.name: To Sir, with Love
25.description: Idealistic engineer-trainee and his experiences in teaching a group of rambunctious white high school students from the slums of London's East End.

26.name: Barefoot in the Park
26.description: Paul, a conservative young lawyer, marries the vivacious Corie. Their highly passionate relationship descends into comical discord in a five-flight New York City walk-up apartment.

27.name: Viy
27.description: A young priest is ordered to preside over the wake of witch in a small old wooden church of a remote village. This means spending three nights alone with the corpse with only his faith to protect him.

28.name: La casa de las mil muñecas
28.description: When a vacationing couple in Tangiers run into an old friend there, they discover that he is searching for his missing girlfriend who has been kidnapped by an international gang of white ...                See full summary »

29.name: In Like Flint
29.description: Super-spy Flint takes on a cabal of women plotting to rule the world.

30.name: Point Blank
30.description: After being double-crossed and left for dead, a mysterious man named Walker single-mindedly tries to retrieve the money that was stolen from him.

31.name: The War Wagon
31.description: The story of a man who was shot, robbed and imprisoned who returns to steal a large gold shipment from the man who wronged him. The gold is transported in an armored stage coach, the War Wagon.

32.name: Camelot
32.description: The story of the marriage of England's King Arthur to Guinevere. The plot of illegitimate Mordred to gain the throne and Guinevere's growing attachment to Sir Lancelot, threaten to topple Arthur and destroy his "round table" of knights.

33.name: Thoroughly Modern Millie
33.description: Millie comes to town in the roaring twenties to encounter flappers, sexuality and white slavers.

34.name: Hour of the Gun
34.description: Marshal Wyatt Earp kills a couple of men of the Clanton gang in a fight. In revenge, Clanton's thugs kill the Marshal's brother. Thus, Wyatt starts to chase the killers together with his friend Doc Holliday.

35.name: Playtime
35.description: Monsieur Hulot curiously wanders around a high-tech Paris, paralleling a trip with a group of American tourists. Meanwhile, a nightclub/restaurant prepares its opening night, but it's still under construction.

36.name: Eye of the Devil
36.description: Workers employed at a French vineyard follow old pagan rituals that call for the life of the marquis owner to save his crops during dry seasons.

37.name: Bedazzled
37.description: A hapless loser sells his soul to the Devil in exchange for seven wishes, but has trouble winning over the girl of his dreams.

38.name: Les demoiselles de Rochefort
38.description: Two sisters leave their small seaside town of Rochefort in search of romance. Hired as carnival singers, one falls for an American musician, while the other must search for her ideal partner.

39.name: Quatermass and the Pit
39.description: A mysterious artifact is unearthed in London, and famous scientist Bernard Quatermass is called into to divine its origins and explain its strange effects on people.

40.name: The Last Challenge
40.description: A deadly gunslinger travels to a town to shoot it out with a famed gunslinger turned lawman in a small town.

41.name: The Ambushers
41.description: Secret agent Matt Helm must battle foreign spies and a rogue nation's exiled ruler in order to recover a hijacked U.S. government experimental flying saucer.

42.name: Tobruk
42.description: A Canadian POW major is rescued by a special British military unit made up of Germans to help lead an attack on a major Nazi fuel depot in Tobruk, Libya.

43.name: Will Penny
43.description: Aging cowboy Will Penny gets a line camp job on a large cattle spread and finds his isolated cabin is already occupied by a husbandless woman and her young son.

44.name: Two for the Road
44.description: A couple in the south of France non-sequentially spin down the highways of infidelity in their troubled ten-year marriage.

45.name: The Born Losers
45.description: Billy Jack battles outlaw motorcycle gang in a small California beach town.

46.name: Mad Monster Party?
46.description: When Dr Frankenstein decides to retire from the monster-making business, he calls an international roster of monsters to a creepy convention to elect his successor. Everyone is there ...                See full summary »

47.name: The Taming of the Shrew
47.description: Brutish, fortune-hunting scoundrel Petruchio (Richard Burton) tames his wealthy, shrewish wife, Katharina (Dame Elizabeth Taylor).

48.name: The Mummy's Shroud
48.description: In 1920 an archaeological expedition discovers the tomb of an ancient Egyptian child prince. Returning home with their discovery, the expedition members soon find themselves being killed ...                See full summary »

49.name: Far from the Madding Crowd
49.description: Bathsheba Everdene, a willful, flirtatious, young woman, unexpectedly inherits a large farm and is romantically pursued by three very different men.

50.name: The Happiest Millionaire
50.description: A happy and unbelievably lucky young Irish immigrant, John Lawless, lands a job as the butler of an unconventional millionaire, Biddle. His daughter, Cordelia Drexel Biddle, tires of the ...                See full summary »
